name: 迈克尔·贝克迈尔
name_full: 迈克尔·贝克迈尔 Michael Bekemeier
introduction: I'm Michael Bekemeier. I'm a stuntman currently based out of Atlanta, GA. I have been doing Parkour/Freerunning for over 14+ years. I specialize in creature work and contortion stunts. I hold the Guinness World Record for the fastest walker in a back bend. I can also do wire-work, ground-pound or whatever you need. Contact me with any questions! Thanks!
